reference.title: ZONE command
reference.shortdesc: The optional ZONE command specifies the time zone where the input IMS log was created. Use ZONE to process IMS logs that were created in a different time zone to the system on which you are running Scrub.

section.p: The log record time stamp is a (GMT) STCK value in the log record suffix. Scrub converts this time stamp to local time by applying the ZONE specification.
Note that when LOCAL is specified (the default), then the system leap second offset (CVTLSO) is also applied.
